summary: This module implements Docker-based packaging for Prefect flows. It defines a manifest object that records flow metadata and can extract the flow definition, and a packager that constructs a Docker image containing the flow and its runtime, handling base images or custom Dockerfiles, configuring Python or Conda environments, normalizing registry URLs, and optionally pushing the image to a container registry.
business_intent: Allow users to containerize and distribute Prefect workflows as portable Docker images, supporting reproducible deployments, CI/CD pipelines, and execution in any Docker-compatible environment.
